Package player.analysis

Class ActionsRating

  • java.lang.Object
    • player.analysis.ActionsRating
  • public class ActionsRating
extends Object
    Class representing a rating for all possible PlayerAction values. Each rating is represented as float value.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private Map<utility.game.player.PlayerAction,​Float> ratingMap  

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ActionsRating()
      Creates an empty ActionsRating with a value of 0 for all PlayerAction values.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      ActionsRating combine​(ActionsRating other, float otherWeight)
      Combines this ActionsRating with another ActionsRating by adding each rating with a weight to the object's rating.
      float getRating​(utility.game.player.PlayerAction playerAction)
      Returns the rating value for a given PlayerAction.
      utility.game.player.PlayerAction maxAction()
      Determines the PlayerAction with the highest rating value.
      float maxRating()
      Determines the maximum rating value of all stored rating values and returns it.
      void normalize()
      Normalizes the ActionsRating by dividing all rating values by the maximum value of all rating values.
      void setRating​(utility.game.player.PlayerAction playerAction, float ratingValue)
      Sets a new value for a given PlayerAction.
      String toString()

    • Method Detail

      • setRating

        public void setRating​(utility.game.player.PlayerAction playerAction,
                      float ratingValue)
        Sets a new value for a given PlayerAction.
        Parameters:
        playerAction - PlayerAction to change the value for
        ratingValue - new value to set

      • getRating

        public float getRating​(utility.game.player.PlayerAction playerAction)
        Returns the rating value for a given PlayerAction.
        Parameters:
        playerAction - PlayerAction to get the rating value for
        Returns:
        rating value

      • maxAction

        public utility.game.player.PlayerAction maxAction()
        Determines the PlayerAction with the highest rating value. If multiple actions have the same rating value the first found PlayerAction will be returned.
        Returns:
        PlayerAction with the maximum rating value

      • maxRating

        public float maxRating()
        Determines the maximum rating value of all stored rating values and returns it.
        Returns:
        maximum rating value

      • normalize

        public void normalize()
        Normalizes the ActionsRating by dividing all rating values by the maximum value of all rating values.

      • combine

        public ActionsRating combine​(ActionsRating other,
                             float otherWeight)
        Combines this ActionsRating with another ActionsRating by adding each rating with a weight to the object's rating.
        Parameters:
        other - ActionsRating to combine with
        otherWeight - weight for the other object
        Returns:
        combined ActionsRating

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
